sentences.sContent: This diauxie curve is typical of inducible enzymes.
sentences.sContent_eng: This diauxie curve is typical of inducible enzymes.
sentences.sCn: 这种双峰曲线是诱导酶的典型增长曲线。

sentences.sContent: Until now, crop breeders have paid little attention to inducible resistance.
sentences.sContent_eng: Until now, crop breeders have paid little attention to inducible resistance.
sentences.sCn: 直到现在为止， 作物培育者还很少注意诱导抗性。

sentences.sContent: Recently it was reported that an intravenously inducible medicine has now come on the market.
sentences.sContent_eng: Recently it was reported that an intravenously inducible medicine has now come on the market.
sentences.sCn: 最近，据报道说一种在静脉内可诱导的药现在已经上市了。
